name: GameofStones
0:
”Alexa open game of stones”
”Remove 5 stones”
”Remove 3 stones”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: game of stones
des:
When you play game of stones you win or you learn. Make wise moves and grab the throne.
There will be a pile of stones between you and Alexa. Both of you can only knock off 2, 3 or 5 stones from that pile on alternative turns. The one who will be out of any 
chances of knocking of stones from the pile will loose the game. And other will be the winner of Game of Stones.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
